  • Traits

Traits#

Traits provide the user with information about the function descriptor constructed using Operators. They are divided into description traits, execution traits, and other traits.

  • Description Traits
    • Direction Trait
    • Algorithm Trait
    • Data Type Trait
    • Maximum Uncompressed Chunk Size Trait
    • SM Trait
    • Is it a description? Trait
    • Is it a complete description? Trait
  • Execution Traits
    • Is it a warp-level execution description? Trait
    • Is it a block-level execution description? Trait
    • BlockDim Trait
    • BlockWarp Trait
    • Is it an execution description? Trait
    • Is it a complete execution description? Trait
  • Other Traits
    • Is it a supported description? Trait
